articles.title: Soccer-Argentina players face health inquiry ahead of Brazil match
articles.description: Brazilian health officials accused four Argentine footballers of breaking quarantine rules on Saturday and began an investigation that could lead to their exclusion from this weekend's World Cup qualifier between the two sides. The Argentina squad flew into Brazil on Friday, the day after beating Venezuela 3-1 in a World Cup qualifier in Caracas.
articles.content:
Brazilian health officials accused four Argentine footballers of breaking quarantine rules on Saturday and began an investigation that could lead to their exclusion from this weekend's World Cup qualifier between the two sides.

articles.title: Soccer-Brazil not out for revenge against Argentina, says Barbosa
articles.description:
Brazil do not see Sunday’s World Cup qualifier against Argentina as potential revenge for their defeat in the Copa America final two months ago, striker Gabriel Barbosa said on Saturday.
The hotly anticipated clash is the second of three World Cup qualifier dates for South American teams in September. Brazil beat Chile 1-0 away on Thursday, while Argentina won 3-1 in Venezuela.
articles.content: Brazil does not see Sunday's World Cup qualifier against Argentina as potential revenge for their defeat in the Copa America final two months ago, striker Gabriel Barbosa said on Saturday. Argentina beat Brazil 1-0 in Rio de Janeiro in July to win th... [1139 chars]

articles.title: Soccer-Clear rules needed on player release says Argentina coach Scaloni
articles.description: Their decision has caused widespread anger in South America, and Scaloni felt it compromised the integrity of the World Cup. “We don’t have any idea of what it is going to be like for the next games and that can’t be,” he told reporters.

articles.title: With new unions, Argentina’s domestic workers fight their way out of poverty and insecurity in the COVID-19 pandemic
articles.description: Women who clean houses and care for children and elders are a large part of this South American country’s work force, but low wages and limited job protections mean many struggle to support their families. These organizers hope to change that

articles.title: Depleted Brazil to face revamped Argentina in WC qualifying
articles.description: Brazil is missing nine England-based players who did not travel because of Britain's coronavirus restrictions.
articles.content:
When Brazil hosts Argentina in Sunday’s World Cup qualifier, it may not be fair to call it a rematch of the Copa America final from less than two months ago.

articles.title: Argentina 2021 economic growth forecast raised to 7.2% - central bank survey
articles.description: Argentina's economy will grow 7.2% in 2021, analysts said in an Argentine central bank poll published on Friday, an improvement on their forecast last month of 6.8% growth.
articles.content:
Pedestrians walk in front of a currency exchange shop in downtown Buenos Aires, Argentina September 3, 2019. REUTERS/Agustin Marcarian

articles.title: Chilean president defends territorial claim in spat with Argentina
articles.description: Chile on Friday reasserted its claim to undersea territory off its southern coast in a dispute with Argentina, which has said Santiago's move violates international treaties. Chile last week officially laid claim to 5,000 square kilometers (1,930 square miles) of continental shelf in the Drake Sea between Chile's Cape Horn, its mainland and the South Shetland Islands of Antarctica.
articles.content:
